items.name: Avalara
items.companyDescription: Leading SaaS provider of tax compliance solutions, serving 30K+ businesses globally

overview.description: Led API-first tax compliance solutions for global e-commerce, drove multi-million dollar ARR through major platform integrations. Focused on developer experience, platform scalability, and strategic partnerships.

achievements.title: Avalara Tax Compliance for Shopify
achievements.description: Led end-to-end development and launch of Avalara's compliance app for Shopify — automated determination across 12,000+ jurisdictions with product catalog sync, end-to-end transaction tracking, and code mapping.
impact: Became top-performing partner integration by revenue
Outpaced competitor who had 6-month head start
Reduced merchant integration time to minutes with no-code setup
Automated tax determination across 40+ countries
Built automated product catalog sync for accurate taxability

achievements.title: Self-Service Purchase Portal
achievements.description: Designed B2C-like self-service purchase experience within B2B integration flow — resolved executive conflict and delivered in 2 weeks.
impact: Achieved 70%+ conversion rate (3x typical B2B benchmark)
Reduced time-to-value from 3 months to under 1 month
Freed 15,000+ hours for high-value sales work
Model adopted for other e-commerce integrations

achievements.title: Tax Returns App Launches/Upgrades
achievements.description: Led tax returns app launches and upgrades on partner platforms
impact: Expanded revenue across Square, Squarespace, and Amazon integrations
Strengthened market leadership in e-commerce tax compliance
Unlocked mid-market segment through strategic SMB platform partnership

achievements.title: Xero Auto Sales Tax Integration
achievements.description: Launched auto sales tax feature for Xero's accounting platform — automated tax calculations and compliance powered by Avalara
impact: Enabled Xero's expansion into the US market with compliant tax solution
Simplified tax compliance for small businesses on Xero platform
Automated jurisdiction-specific tax calculations

achievements.title: AI-Powered Classification Adoption
achievements.description: Championed integration of AI/ML classification capabilities into partner platform products
impact: Drove adoption of AI-powered tax code classification in Shopify integration
Improved catalog processing efficiency across partner platforms

achievements.title: Public Speaking & Thought Leadership
achievements.description: Industry engagements sharing product and integration expertise
impact: Presented at Avalara Partner Product Updates webinar
Speaker at Avalara NEXT 2023 Developer Conference
Featured on Do the Woo podcast — PM journey and integration strategy

items.name: Oracle
items.companyDescription: Fortune 100 enterprise software leader in database and cloud solutions

overview.description: Product strategy for Oracle CX Sales data operations platform — enterprise B2B CRM at scale. Focused on API-driven data management, ML-powered automation, and operational efficiency.

achievements.title: Alternate Key & External System Linking
achievements.description: Led initiative to enable external system ID linking for enterprise data imports — eliminating dependency on Oracle primary keys
impact: Enabled PUID and Original System Reference linking — prevented churn for enterprise customers
Reduced integration complexity for 1:M relationships and Dynamic Choice Lists
Improved data import success rates for enterprise customers with complex system landscapes

achievements.title: ML-Powered Import Prediction
achievements.description: Shipped ML-based prediction system for import job scheduling and resource allocation
impact: Built predictive model for import job completion times
Enabled proactive resource allocation reducing queue wait times
Reduced cost per import cycle through ML-optimized scheduling

achievements.title: Import/Export Ops Optimization
achievements.description: Delivered operational efficiency improvements across the data import/export framework
impact: Implemented dynamic queue management — reduced support escalations
Added reusable advanced options — decreased import/export setup time
Delivered measurable annual savings through operational efficiency

items.name: ZS Associates
items.companyDescription: Global management consulting and technology leader in healthcare and life sciences

overview.description: Built enterprise analytics platform products in healthcare/life sciences — from 0-to-1 AWS resource management to rapid application deployment tools.

achievements.title: REVO™ Workbench Management Console
achievements.description: First 0-to-1 product — intelligent AWS resource provisioning for data science teams as part of the REVO Analytics platform
impact: Reduced ML/AI compute resource provisioning time by ~80%
Cut customer infrastructure costs by ~30%
Self-service console for project creation, team management, and resource allocation

achievements.title: Javelin Application Catalyst
achievements.description: Prebuilt application templates integrating web frameworks and Iron Python for rapid analytics deployment
impact: Generated new revenue stream within first year of launch
Reduced deployment costs by ~60%
Accelerated custom analytics application development
Stabilized platform and transitioned to maintenance mode

items.name: Spacelabs Healthcare
items.companyDescription: Leading provider of medical devices and healthcare monitoring solutions

overview.description: Product owner for patient monitoring connectivity solutions — delivering EHR integrations, cloud readiness, and critical system updates during COVID-19.

achievements.title: XprezzNet™ Connectivity Platform
achievements.description: Product owner for high-resolution vital signs connectivity solution integrating with major EHR systems
impact: Multiple releases certified to Epic and Cerner standards
Prepped platform for cloud deployment and SaaS integration (SafeNSound)
Enabled third-party device integration via Flexport® interfaces (ventilators, hemodynamic monitors)

achievements.title: Xhibit Central Station Updates
achievements.description: Led critical system updates and hardware refresh during COVID-19 microchip crisis
impact: Delivered alarm audio loss correction across deployed hospital systems
Managed hardware refresh strategy during global chip shortage
Evaluated secure remote maintenance solutions for field support

items.name: Tata Consultancy Services
items.companyDescription: Global leader in IT services and digital solutions

overview.description: Progressed from development to program management — leading P2P automation implementations for Fortune 500 customers.

achievements.title: TCS TAP™ Accounts Payable Platform
achievements.description: Pre-sales and implementation PM for cloud-based P2P automation — led 4-member team serving Fortune 500 customers
impact: Drove product revenue growth via cloud SaaS offering
Reduced deployment timeline by 4 weeks through refined CX processes
Cut implementation costs through process optimization

achievements.title: TCS MasterCraft™ Documentation Platform
achievements.description: Built open-source CMS for standardized SaaS product documentation — integrated with MasterCraft™ suite
impact: Reduced product support costs by ~15%
Enabled self-service documentation publishing for global teams
Foundation for tech writing expertise applied throughout career

items.name: Datafi Labs
items.companyDescription: Innovation-focused startup in data access control and governance

overview.description: Sole PM collaborating with CEO and CTO to shape product vision — concept to MVP in 3 months, securing pilot customers.

achievements.title: Datafi Cloud Platform MVP
achievements.description: Conceived and led unified data productivity platform from idea to MVP — for data analysts and business teams
impact: 0 to MVP in 3 months as sole PM
Secured two pilot customers through deep customer insights
Shaped product vision, strategy, and roadmap with CEO/CTO

overview.description: Building an AI-powered job search system to streamline the job hunting process.

achievements.title: Job Search Automation
achievements.description: End-to-end system for managing job search workflow
impact: Automated repetitive job search tasks
Integrated AI for application optimization

overview.description: Built a Chrome extension that analyzes LinkedIn profiles with AI-powered feedback for career positioning.

achievements.title: AI-Powered Profile Analysis
achievements.description: Chrome extension delivering real-time LinkedIn profile optimization
impact: GPT-4 powered content quality scoring and recommendations
Completeness scoring with section-by-section breakdown
Privacy-first architecture — user-supplied API keys, no data collection

items.name: SAP Concur
items.companyDescription: Leading SaaS provider of travel and expense management solutions for enterprises

overview.description: MBA intern for Internal Tools group managing organization-wide Agile and DevOps platforms. Built and launched a support portal serving 5000+ users.

achievements.title: Support Portal Launch
achievements.description: Conceptualized, built, and launched a new support portal product streamlining support requests from 5000+ users
impact: Achieved 80% global user adoption at launch
Reduced response time by 4x through 2 major portal changes
Defined 9 KPIs to monitor customer experience and product performance

achievements.title: SAP Conversational AI Chatbot PoC
achievements.description: Built a proof-of-concept chatbot to respond to user FAQs using SAP Conversational AI
impact: Aimed to boost developer productivity by 10%
Created recorded demos and user-facing documentation for adoption

items.name: Couchbase
items.companyDescription: Leader in the $40bn database industry, developing the Couchbase NoSQL database system

overview.description: MBA consulting engagement delivering actionable web marketing strategy recommendations to grow organic engagement.

achievements.title: Web Marketing Strategy Pivot
achievements.description: Developed and delivered strategic recommendations pivoting the 2019-20 marketing plan
impact: Presented strategy directly to CMO and leadership team
6 actionable recommendations on web marketing strategy
Targeted ~30% growth in organic engagement (230k+ unique impressions)
Built competitive analysis scorecard benchmarking against 3 key competitors
